Name: Horns of Fear
About the game: Horns of Fear is a third-person psychological horror game set in a mysterious mansion. You are Jim Sonrimor, a journalist fascinated by the paranormal. Your phone rings one night. The caller invites you to a strange mansion, bordering a forest with a gruesome reputation. Without hesitation, you drive off to visit the place... Embark on this terrifying journey and unravel the mysteries hidden within the mansion. Third-person psychological horror game. Harrowing exploration and atmosphere. Items to collect and puzzles to solve. Made almost entirely by one person. An original soundtrack by Vinsfeld. Steam achievements. Warning: This game contains images that some may find disturbing. Have fun! Epilepsy warning: Certain visual effects may be problematic for players with a history of epilepsy.
